eckoWALLET: The Leading Kadena-Native Web Extension Wallet

Robust and User-Friendly
eckoWALLET is the premier and most widely used web extension wallet tailored for the Kadena network. It offers a seamless and secure way to interact with decentralized applications (dApps) without ever leaving your browser.

Key Features within Chrome/Brave:
Token Management: Easily send and receive all tokens on the Kadena network.
NFT Support: View and manage your favorite Kadena NFTs.
Fiat On-Ramp Services: Buy Kadena directly using fiat currency via Simplex.
Staking: Stake your $KDX tokens to earn voting power for eckoGOV.
Cross-Chain Transfers: Execute and complete cross-chain transfers automatically.
Transaction History: View detailed incoming and outgoing transaction history.
Account Customization: Edit accounts with personalized aliases.
Design Themes: Customize your wallet with themes such as light, dark, and dark blue.
Security: Utilize a 2FA security mechanism for enhanced protection.
Contact List: Create and manage a list of contacts.
Network and dApp Access: Easily access Kadena networks and dApps, and safely sign transactions and hashes.
Customization: Personalize network settings, transaction parameters, and gas fees.
Analytics and Insights: Access comprehensive analytics with charts and key data to monitor your transactions and portfolio performance.
Constant Updates: Enjoy a continuously evolving feature set with regular updates.

Comprehensive dApp Interaction
eckoWALLET is designed to provide everything you need to interact with and sign transactions on dApps like eckoDEX and eckoGOV.

Seamless Account Integration
Users can quickly regenerate preexisting accounts by reusing password seed phrases from the eckoWALLET mobile app or Chainweaver (Kadena's official wallet).
